description: Easy-to-setup local RAG server with minimal configuration

BASE_DIR.description: Base directory for document storage (defaults to current working directory)

DB_PATH.description: Path to LanceDB database directory (defaults to ./lancedb/)

CACHE_DIR.description: Directory where Transformers.js models are cached (defaults to ./models/)

MAX_FILE_SIZE.description: Maximum file size in bytes (defaults to 104857600 / 100MB)

CHUNK_SIZE.description: Text chunk size for splitting documents (defaults to 512)
